author.name: Kristiyan
author.description: Kristiyan Yankov has experience in business development, sales, and growth hacking since 2012. Working with marketing agencies and covering customer relationships for both small and big clients enabled him to understand some of the main components for establishing and growing a brand in a genuine and long-lasting way.

node.title: Talking about Blockchain, NFTs, ART, Join us on Clubhouse App
node.content:
Hey there people!

We’ve invited some of the most interesting blockchain enthusiasts to host a meet in Clubhouse App on Monday, Mar 1, 10 AM PST. Join the discussion on Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs), blockchain and art.

Link to the event can be found here.
